name: A Sinful Camp
description:
◆Featured Systems

◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.

◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

-In a concentration camp full of sins, stimulated by days after days of centralized life and witnessing the lustful postures of the girl of your dreams, you abandon all your moral values and gradually become a victim of lust...

◆Story


Taken to a concentration camp, I wanted to fight for my freedom, but there I met the girl of my dreams - a student named Anna.

"Please protect me... please get me out of here..." the angelic girl pleaded desperately with tears in her eyes.

At night, there came an unsettling noise from the room next to mine.
Following the sound, I got closer to the wall and looked through the cracks in the old tiles to see my goddess being violated mercilessly by her guards...!
And yet, filled with grief and anger, I was inexplicably aroused, subconsciously pulling down my trousers and placing my hand on my swollen desire...

I spent the next few nights peeping at my beloved girl being violated in the room next to mine, but when I met Anna again during the day, I didn't have the courage to confess it all.
Then one day, a mysterious, haughty girl in high heels appeared, claiming to be the camp's director. She asked if I would serve her, which made my already confused mind even more stirred.

Every long night, I witnessed the sexual excitement that tore my heart and made me feel less and less like myself...
The fog that hid the truth of the camp slowly lifted before my eyes...

◆Gameplay Instructions

At the start of the game, you have three opportunities to act each day.

You can choose to visit Anna in the [Cell] to improve your relationship.
To read a book in the [Library] to improve your mind.
Or to go to the [Tutelage Room] to witness the so-called "sin" further...

When the plot develops after a certain number of days, the arrogant camp director "Thera" will appear, after which the [Camp Director's Room] will be opened during the day, and you can [talk] with her to strengthen your relationship. When your favorability reaches a certain amount, you can trigger [H Events].

On some nights you will have an additional opportunity to take actions. You can choose from [Talk to Anna], [Read a book] or [Rest].
Every action you choose during your 15 days at the camp will have an impact on the path you will eventually take.

◆Game Features

◇25 basic CGs, including more than 300 differentials.

◇Game text: 90,000[This might be different in English] words.
◇Two main female characters and three secondary female characters.
◇NTR plot and concentration camp themed game.
◇Game endings: 6 different kinds.
